cards.html: In addition, paid supporting subscribers will have access to an exclusive once-a-month BONUS episode of Lever Live. Supporting subscribers will be able to chat with our editorial staff in real time. We will send supporting subscribers a special personalized link to these bonus events before they occur.

sections: A reminder that today at 4pm ET (1pm PT) we will be hosting our weekly Callin show,
. This week, David Sirota and and
team members will be discussing the news of the week, including President Biden’s announcement that he’ll be running for re-election. We’ll also be taking questions from the audience LIVE on-air.
is publicly available for anyone to listen to and participate in. Just click the button below to find the show on Callin at 4pm ET.
